Giving presentations with your wiimote

Author: Geert-Dietger Hoffmann

Geert and Dag are working on a software project that will take advantage of all the capabilities of your wiimote to use it as a presentation device that is perfect for mainstream use. The software is not finished yet, but even if it does not arrive by T-DOSE we can already demonstrate some unique features now.

more:
http://www.t-dose.org/2008/talk/wiimote

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 26, 2008
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2008, Giving presentations with your wiimote, Geert-Dietger Hoffmann
